data.eml:eml: Roarumsfeldi, a new butterflyfish (Teleostei, Chaetodontidae) from mesophotic coral ecosystems of the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rocha, Luiz A., Pinheiro, Hudson T., Wandell, Matt, Rocha, Claudia R., Shepherd, Bart (2017): Roarumsfeldi, a new butterflyfish (Teleostei, Chaetodontidae) from mesophotic coral ecosystems of the Philippines. ZooKeys 709: 127-134, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.709.20404, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.709.20404
